seo.title: YakShaver developer certifications
seo.description: Earn a YakShaver Developer Credly Badge for LinkedIn. The badge shows that you're a YakShaver certified developer!

pageBlocks.byLine:
We encourage developers to get verified by running YakShaver and completing the basics before implementing it on a real project.\
\
Benefit: organization gets YakShaver for free if someone has a badge

* create a new test repository in GitHub or Azure DevOps
* connect it to yakshaver in the client portal
* do a yakshave to the repository and show that it worked
* record a done video showing how this process works
* rerun a failed yakshave (TODO to add feature by YakShaver team)
* look at the log history (TODO by YakShaver team)
* Scenario: what would you do in this situation? (base answer off FAQs)
